item.description: The Knitting Guild Association and the Crochet Association people are having a joint show in Manchester at the Radisson Hotel. There are classes you can sign up for and a market with vendors. If you want to take classes, sign up as soon as possible. Check the schedules for when the market is open. For more info go to www.KnitandCrochetShow.com
item.name: TKGA Knit and Crochet Show - Day 1
